name: PiCCi
description:
PiCCi is a short puzzle game taking place in an laboratory where you have to show your intelligence.

It takes ca. 30 mins to beat the game.

Game developed by UE4 in 2 weeks.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Grab Item/Interact: LMB

Jump: Space Bar

Esc: Pause and settings

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
